thread.title: Tori Kelly thinks it's "awesome" Justin Bieber wants to live like Jesus - Music
thread.title_full: Tori Kelly thinks it's "awesome" Justin Bieber wants to live like Jesus - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Amy Davidson
title: Tori Kelly thinks it's "awesome" Justin Bieber wants to live like Jesus - Music
text: Justin Bieber raised a few eyebrows last month when he said he wanted to "live like Jesus", but one person singing his praises is Tori Kelly.The singer-songwriter, who like Justin is open about her faith, has said it's "awesome" the star speaks out about his Christianity. Â© Getty Images / Stefan Hoederath "I think it's awesome the things that he said and the fact he's being so open and willing to step out and be bold and not hide what he believes in," Tori told Digital Spy."I think that's really cool. He's already inspired so many people but that just takes it to another level, so it's exciting that we're able to be open about stuff like that."Unlike Justin, whose past antics have landed him in a spot of bother, Tori doesn't think finding fame at a young age has affected her. "I think with my journey so far it never felt like an overwhelming, overnight success story. I think that's good for me because I really got to take my time," she mused.Tori Kelly's debut album Unbreakable Smile has already topped the charts in the US, and is out in the UK now.Watch the music video for Tori Kelly's 'Should've Been Us' below:
